title: What were the Wimbledon results?

excerpt: Jannik Sinner and Novak Djokovic reached the fourth round at Wimbledon on Saturday. View Saturday's results from the All England Club.

html:
Wimbledon

Sinner, Djokovic reach fourth round

July 05, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Wimbledon main-draw action runs until 13 July. By ATP Staff

Jannik Sinner and Novak Djokovic continued their Wimbledon campaigns on Saturday with straight-sets third-round victories.

View Saturday's featured results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores.

Centre Court
[1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) def. Pedro Martinez (ESP) 6-1, 6-3, 6-1
[8] Iga Swiatek (POL) def. Danielle Collins (USA) 6-2, 6-3
[6] Novak Djokovic (SRB) def. Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) 6-3, 6-0, 6-4

No. 1 Court
[7] Mirra Andreeva def. Hailey Baptiste (USA) 6-1, 6-3
[10] Emma Navarro (USA) def. Barbora Krejcikova (CZE) 2-6, 6-3, 6-4
[10] Ben Shelton (USA) def. Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 6-3, 7-6(4), 6-2

Read More from Wimbledon:
How Majchrzak’s wife-turned-trainer is fuelling his historic Wimbledon journey
Djokovic joins Federer, earns 100th Wimbledon match win
Thompson defies injury for Wimbledon breakthrough
